Description: Adds randomized role list generation to Custom!

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Role Bucket Chance
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The chance of a role bucket being chosen instead of a role.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Maximum Modifiers
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of modifiers that can be selected when using /randomall without values set.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Maximum Bans
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of bans that can be selected when using /randomall without values set.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Randomize Lobby Info
CheckboxSettings.Description: Randomizes the lobby name and icon when running /randomall.
